Target: piracy attacks for ransom on commercial vessels

text: Among the eight attacks noted above , it was confirmed that a ransom payment was made in five of the cases . However , negotiations about ransom were not disclosed . Yoshihiko Yamada , domestic division chief of Nippon Foundation 's Department of Marine Affairs said , " There were very few piracy attacks for ransom on commercial vessels . A prevailing view is that these piracy attacks are actually committed by anti-government guerrillas amidst mounting political unrest . "
